component.name: getAnArtist
component.description: Get Spotify catalog information for a single artist identified by their unique Spotify ID.

component.name: getAlbumsOfAnArtist
component.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist’s albums.

component.name: getRelatedArtistsToAnArtist
component.description: Get Spotify catalog information about artists similar to a given artist.

component.name: getSeveralArtists
component.description: Get Spotify catalog information for several artists based on their Spotify IDs.

component.name: getTopTracksOfAnArtist
component.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist’s top tracks by country.
